attributes.action: justify why pensioners, and others like us on low incomes, should contribute via the tax system, to paying his television licence and house cleaning bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We require a clear answer from the prime minister that explains the basis for him (and other MPs) to be able to use tax payers money in this way.  Expenses that are directly related to his work for the country are understandable, but these type of expenses claims appear just opportunistic and unconstititutional, albeit they might come within the 'rules'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
